#  News Release Details 

# 

Cimpress to present at the BofA Securities Leveraged Finance Conference on December 4, 2024 in Boca Raton, FL

November 25, 2024 at 8:00 AM EST

[PDF Version](/node/25021/pdf)

DUNDALK, Ireland--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Nov. 25, 2024-- Cimpress plc (Nasdaq: CMPR) today announced that Sean Quinn, Executive Vice President and CFO, will present at the BofA Securities Leveraged Finance Conference on Wednesday, December 4, 2024. Cimpress plc’s presentation is scheduled to begin at 10:10am ET. 

The presentation will be webcast and can be accessed through the Cimpress Investor Relations website at [ir.cimpress.com/news-and-events/events](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fir.cimpress.com%2Fnews-and-events%2Fevents&esheet=54156493&newsitemid=20241125535921&lan=en-US&anchor=ir.cimpress.com%2Fnews-and-events%2Fevents&index=1&md5=7a2ef38be6e8fc32a551042031380fbf), and a replay of the presentation will be available at the same link until December 4, 2025. 

**About Cimpress**

Cimpress plc (Nasdaq: CMPR) invests in and builds customer-focused, entrepreneurial, print mass-customization businesses for the long term. Mass customization is a competitive strategy which seeks to produce goods and services to meet individual customer needs with near mass production efficiency. Cimpress businesses include BuildASign, druck.at, Drukwerkdeal, easyflyer, Exaprint, National Pen, Packstyle, Pixartprinting, Printi, Tradeprint, VistaPrint, and WIRmachenDRUCK. To learn more, visit [cimpress.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fcimpress.com&esheet=54156493&newsitemid=20241125535921&lan=en-US&anchor=cimpress.com&index=2&md5=2fea57269b1e9be5214ec9b8987788e6). 

Cimpress and the Cimpress logo are trademarks of Cimpress plc or its subsidiaries. All other brand and product names appearing on this announcement may be trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders. 

![](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=bwnews&sty=20241125535921r1&sid=acqr8&distro=nx&lang=en)

View source version on [businesswire.com](http://businesswire.com): <https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20241125535921/en/>

**Investor Relations:** Meredith Burns ir@cimpress.com +1.781.652.6480 

**Media Relations:** Sara Litwiller mediarelations@cimpress.com

Source: Cimpress plc

#  News Release Details 

# 

Cimpress Reports First Quarter Fiscal Year 2025 Financial Results

October 30, 2024 at 4:05 PM EDT

[PDF Version](/node/24916/pdf)

DUNDALK, Ireland--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Oct. 30, 2024-- Cimpress plc (Nasdaq: CMPR) has posted on its investor relations website at [ir.cimpress.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fir.cimpress.com%2F&esheet=54144182&newsitemid=20241030300218&lan=en-US&anchor=ir.cimpress.com&index=1&md5=0b608974abbf08dc8947a2b652ac33c3) its financial results for the first quarter of fiscal year 2025, in a PDF file called "Q1 Fiscal Year 2025 Quarterly Earnings Document," along with an accompanying spreadsheet with historical financial results and operating metrics. Cimpress also posted a document called "Q1 FY2025 Guide to Reporting Changes" that describes changes to segment-level reporting that we referenced in our September 10, 2024 investor day. 

As previously announced, Cimpress will host a public Q&A session tomorrow, Thursday, October 31, 2024 at 8:00 am ET. The live audio event will be accessible on [ir.cimpress.com/news-and-events/events](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fir.cimpress.com%2Fnews-and-events%2Fevents&esheet=54144182&newsitemid=20241030300218&lan=en-US&anchor=ir.cimpress.com%2Fnews-and-events%2Fevents&index=2&md5=e25c5ac1a2fa37a33b2e814a8670ff03), and a replay will be available at the same link following the call. We will take live questions via chat, and investors may also presubmit questions any time before 11:00 pm ET today by emailing ir@cimpress.com. 

**About Cimpress **Cimpress plc (Nasdaq: CMPR) invests in and builds customer-focused, entrepreneurial, print mass-customization businesses for the long term. Mass customization is a competitive strategy which seeks to produce goods and services to meet individual customer needs with near mass production efficiency. Cimpress businesses include BuildASign, druck.at, Drukwerkdeal, easyflyer, Exaprint, National Pen, Packstyle, Pixartprinting, Printi, Tradeprint, VistaPrint, and WIRmachenDRUCK. To learn more, visit [cimpress.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fcimpress.com%2F&esheet=54144182&newsitemid=20241030300218&lan=en-US&anchor=cimpress.com&index=3&md5=3690a9247f00080d14d14d2393932dd3). 

Cimpress and the Cimpress logo are trademarks of Cimpress plc or its subsidiaries. All other brand and product names appearing on this announcement may be trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders. 

![](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=bwnews&sty=20241030300218r1&sid=acqr8&distro=nx&lang=en)

View source version on [businesswire.com](http://businesswire.com): <https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20241030300218/en/>

**Investor Relations:** Meredith Burns ir@cimpress.com +1.781.652.6480 

**Media Relations:** Sara Litwiller mediarelations@cimpress.com

Source: Cimpress plc

#  News Release Details 

# 

Cimpress to Host Public Q&A Call Following Q1 FY2025 Earnings Announcement

October 10, 2024 at 4:30 PM EDT

[PDF Version](/node/24866/pdf)

DUNDALK, Ireland--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Oct. 10, 2024-- Cimpress plc (Nasdaq: CMPR) announced that it will host a public Q&A call on Thursday, October 31, 2024 at 8:00 am ET following the release of its Q1 FY2025financial results at 4:05 pm ET on Wednesday, October 30, 2024. The live call will be accessible on [ir.cimpress.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fir.cimpress.com%2Fnews-and-events%2Fevents&esheet=54134303&newsitemid=20241010493245&lan=en-US&anchor=ir.cimpress.com&index=1&md5=047dc6cbd2dee8f79d26390698c58386), and a replay will be available at the same link following the call. We will take live questions on the call via chat, and investors may also presubmit questions any time before 11:00 pm ET on Wednesday, October 30, 2024 by emailing ir@cimpress.com. 

**About Cimpress**

Cimpress plc (Nasdaq: CMPR) invests in and builds customer-focused, entrepreneurial, print mass-customization businesses for the long term. Mass customization is a competitive strategy which seeks to produce goods and services to meet individual customer needs with near mass production efficiency. Cimpress businesses include BuildASign, Drukwerkdeal, Exaprint, National Pen, Packstyle, Pixartprinting, Printi, VistaPrint, and WIRmachenDRUCK. To learn more, visit [cimpress.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fcimpress.com%2F&esheet=54134303&newsitemid=20241010493245&lan=en-US&anchor=cimpress.com&index=2&md5=c53d7ff1014ebe006c7e42d69604eb71). 

Cimpress and the Cimpress logo are trademarks of Cimpress plc or its subsidiaries. All other brand and product names appearing on this announcement may be trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders. 

![](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=bwnews&sty=20241010493245r1&sid=acqr8&distro=nx&lang=en)

View source version on [businesswire.com](http://businesswire.com): <https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20241010493245/en/>

**Investor Relations:** Meredith Burns ir@cimpress.com +1.781.652.6480 

**Media Relations:** Sara Litwiller mediarelations@cimpress.com

Source: Cimpress plc

#  News Release Details 

# 

Cimpress Completes Offering of $525 Million of Senior Notes Due 2032

September 26, 2024 at 4:05 PM EDT

[PDF Version](/node/24816/pdf)

DUNDALK, Ireland--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Sep. 26, 2024-- Cimpress plc (Nasdaq: CMPR) today announced it has completed its previously announced private offering (the “Offering”) of $525.0 million in aggregate principal amount of 7.375% senior notes due 2032 (the “notes”). The notes will pay interest on a semi-annual basis. 

Concurrently with the consummation of the Offering, we amended our existing credit agreement to, among other things, extend the maturity of our revolving credit facility and amend the interest rate applicable to any loans under our revolving credit facility (the “Credit Agreement Amendment”). 

We used the net proceeds of the Offering, together with cash on hand, to fund the redemption of all of our 7.0% Senior Notes due 2026 and to pay all fees and expenses related to the Offering and the Credit Agreement Amendment. 

The notes have not been registered under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the “Securities Act”), and may not be offered or sold in the United States absent registration or an applicable exemption from the registration requirements of the Securities Act, and other applicable securities laws. Within the United States, the notes will only be offered to persons who are reasonably believed to be “qualified institutional buyers,” as defined in Rule 144A under the Securities Act. Outside the United States, the notes will only be offered to persons other than “U.S. persons,” as defined in Rule 902 under the Securities Act, in offshore transactions in reliance upon Regulation S under the Securities Act. 

This press release is neither an offer to sell nor the solicitation of an offer to buy the notes or any security and shall not constitute an offer, solicitation or sale in any jurisdiction in which such offer, solicitation or sale is unlawful. 

Some of the statements in this press release are “forward-looking” and are made pursuant to the safe harbor provision of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995. These “forward-looking” statements include statements relating to, among other things, the Offering, the Credit Agreement Amendment and the intended use of proceeds of the Offering. These statements involve risks and uncertainties that may cause results to differ materially from the statements set forth in this press release, including market conditions and the risks and uncertainties referenced from time to time in the Company’s filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission. The Company expressly disclaims any obligation or undertaking to release publicly any updates or revisions to such statements to reflect any change in its expectations with regard thereto or any changes in the events, conditions or circumstances on which any such statement is based. 

**About Cimpress **Cimpress plc (Nasdaq: CMPR) invests in and builds customer-focused, entrepreneurial, print mass-customization businesses for the long term. Mass customization is a competitive strategy which seeks to produce goods and services to meet individual customer needs with near mass production efficiency. Cimpress businesses include BuildASign, Drukwerkdeal, Exaprint, National Pen, Packstyle, Pixartprinting, Printi, VistaPrint, and WIRmachenDRUCK. 

Cimpress and the Cimpress logo are trademarks of Cimpress plc or its subsidiaries. All other brand and product names appearing on this announcement may be trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders. 

![](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=bwnews&sty=20240926770412r1&sid=acqr8&distro=nx&lang=en)

View source version on [businesswire.com](http://businesswire.com): <https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20240926770412/en/>

**Investor Relations:** Meredith Burns ir@cimpress.com +1.781.652.6480 

**Media Relations:** Sara Litwiller mediarelations@cimpress.com

Source: Cimpress plc

#  News Release Details 

# 

Cimpress Prices Offering of $525 Million of Senior Notes Due 2032

September 12, 2024 at 6:46 PM EDT

[PDF Version](/node/24801/pdf)

DUNDALK, Ireland--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Sep. 12, 2024-- Cimpress plc (Nasdaq: CMPR) today announced it has priced the previously announced private offering (the “Offering”) of $525.0 million in aggregate principal amount of 7.375% senior notes due 2032 (the “notes”). The notes will pay interest on a semi-annual basis. The price to investors will be 100% of the principal amount of the notes. The issuance of the notes is expected to close on September 26, 2024, subject to customary closing conditions. 

Concurrently with the consummation of the Offering, we intend to amend our existing credit agreement to, among other things, extend the maturity of our revolving credit facility and amend the interest rate applicable to any loans under our revolving credit facility (the “Credit Agreement Amendment”). 

We intend to use the net proceeds of this offering, together with cash on hand, to fund the redemption of all of our existing 7.0% Senior Notes due 2026 and to pay all fees and expenses related to the Offering and the Credit Agreement Amendment. The consummation of the Offering is not contingent upon the closing of the Credit Agreement Amendment and the closing of the Credit Agreement Amendment is not contingent upon the consummation of the Offering. 

The notes have not been registered under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the “Securities Act”), and may not be offered or sold in the United States absent registration or an applicable exemption from the registration requirements of the Securities Act, and other applicable securities laws. Within the United States, the notes will only be offered to persons who are reasonably believed to be “qualified institutional buyers,” as defined in Rule 144A under the Securities Act. Outside the United States, the notes will only be offered to persons other than “U.S. persons,” as defined in Rule 902 under the Securities Act, in offshore transactions in reliance upon Regulation S under the Securities Act. 

This press release is neither an offer to sell nor the solicitation of an offer to buy the notes or any security and shall not constitute an offer, solicitation or sale in any jurisdiction in which such offer, solicitation or sale is unlawful. 

Some of the statements in this press release are “forward-looking” and are made pursuant to the safe harbor provision of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995. These “forward-looking” statements include statements relating to, among other things, the Offering, the Credit Agreement Amendment and the intended use of proceeds of the Offering. These statements involve risks and uncertainties that may cause results to differ materially from the statements set forth in this press release, including market conditions and the risks and uncertainties referenced from time to time in the Company’s filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission. The Company expressly disclaims any obligation or undertaking to release publicly any updates or revisions to such statements to reflect any change in its expectations with regard thereto or any changes in the events, conditions or circumstances on which any such statement is based. 

**About Cimpress**

Cimpress plc (Nasdaq: CMPR) invests in and builds customer-focused, entrepreneurial, print mass-customization businesses for the long term. Mass customization is a competitive strategy which seeks to produce goods and services to meet individual customer needs with near mass production efficiency. Cimpress businesses include BuildASign, Drukwerkdeal, Exaprint, National Pen, Packstyle, Pixartprinting, Printi, VistaPrint, and WIRmachenDRUCK. 

Cimpress and the Cimpress logo are trademarks of Cimpress plc or its subsidiaries. All other brand and product names appearing on this announcement may be trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders. 

![](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=bwnews&sty=20240912669160r1&sid=acqr8&distro=nx&lang=en)

View source version on [businesswire.com](http://businesswire.com): <https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20240912669160/en/>

**Investor Relations:** Meredith Burns ir@cimpress.com +1.781.652.6480 **Media Relations:** Sara Litwiller mediarelations@cimpress.com

Source: Cimpress plc
